body:
I think the previous threads were archived (I did "setup site:avicus.net" on Google and only showed two), so I decided to create a thread a new thread. Sorry if this is a duplicate thread.

Show us your setup/rig/battlestation is basically where you show off your computer setup. Your table, your computer, your gaming mouse, your headphones; basically everything that's on your gaming area. You can also discuss with other users about the specs of what they have in their rig or what some players' mouses' name is.

Images (the picture below plus more)

replies.body:
Don't get that one if you're looking for something good which is gonna last


http://www.videocardbenchmark.net/gpu.php?gpu=GeForce+GT+610
gt 610 got a score of 351
A very common gpu is the gtx 660, which scored 4118 (higher better)
Which is a huge difference.
As for the cpu, amd 6300 @ 3.5 ghz
Not too bad, scored a 6368, could be better but good for the price.
